name: THE TALENTED SANTIAGO
description: For SANTIAGO, being born without a body was a nightmare. His childhood was spent getting picked on. But Santiago didn’t let this stop him. Instead, he channeled his passion for yoga to spiritually evolve. Using an ancient text, Santiago taught himself how to vomit on command. Then, he taught his mind to CONTROL the vomit, allowing the vomit to form limbs to support his giant head so that he could finally accomplish the same things that a ‘folk with a body could! By @AlexPardee
